name: Coffee Pong with a Pope
description:
Created for the itch.io Coffee Jam by MissMyu #CoffeeJam.  It's like beer pong but with coffee!  Play against Pope Clement VIII in his quest to bless coffee!  *NOTE Top score does not work in browser.

Tools Used:

  • Unity 2018.2.0f2
  • Audacity
  • Photoshop
  • Visual Studio 2015

All assets used are free and/or public domain and some of my own stuff.

Check out my Unity Asset store tools here!
